participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

parental_monitor_q1_p.Description: Do you know what your child is doing on his/her free time? / ¿Sabe lo qué hace su niño(a) en su tiempo libre? | 1 = Almost always / Casi siempre; 2 = Most of the time / La mayor parte del tiempo; 3 = It varies / Varía; 4 = Seldom / Casi nunca; 5 = Never / Nunca; 777 = Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

Levels.2: Most of the time / La mayor parte del tiempo
Levels.777: Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

parental_monitor_q2_p.Description: Do you know which friends the child spends time with in their free time? / ¿Conoce con cuáles amigos su niño(a) comparte su tiempo libre? | 1 = We know all of them / Conocemos a todos; 2 = We know most of them / Conocemos a la mayoría; 3 = We know some of them / Conocemos a algunos; 4 = We know none of them / No conocemos a ningunos; 777 = Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

Levels.1: We know all of them / Conocemos a todos
Levels.2: We know most of them / Conocemos a la mayoría
Levels.3: We know some of them / Conocemos a algunos
Levels.4: We know none of them / No conocemos a ningunos
Levels.777: Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

parental_monitor_q3_p.Description: Do you usually know what homework your child has? / ¿Sabe qué tareas tiene su niño(a) usualmente? | 1 = Almost always / Casi siempre; 2 = Most of the time / La mayor parte del tiempo; 3 = It varies / Varía; 4 = Seldom / Casi nunca; 5 = Never / Nunca; 777 = Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

Levels.2: Most of the time / La mayor parte del tiempo
Levels.777: Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

parental_monitor_q4_p.Description: Do you know what your child spends his/her money on? / ¿Sabe en qué gasta su niño(a) su dinero? | 1 = Almost always / Casi siempre; 2 = Most of the time / La mayor parte del tiempo; 3 = It varies / Varía; 4 = Seldom / Casi nunca; 5 = Never / Nunca; 777 = Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

Levels.2: Most of the time / La mayor parte del tiempo
Levels.777: Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

parental_monitor_q5_p.Description: Do you usually know when your child has an exam or paper due in school? / ¿Usualmente sabe cuándo su niño(a) tiene un examen o trabajo pendiente en la escuela? | 1 = Almost always / Casi siempre; 2 = Most of the time / La mayor parte del tiempo; 3 = It varies / Varía; 4 = Seldom / Casi nunca; 5 = Never / Nunca; 777 = Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

Levels.2: Most of the time / La mayor parte del tiempo
Levels.777: Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

parental_monitor_q6_p.Description: Do you avoid taking up certain issues with your child due to bad experiences, e.g. how the child reacted earlier? / ¿Evita discutir ciertos asuntos con su niño(a) a causa de malas experiencias (por ejemplo, la manera en que su niño(a) reaccionó anteriormente)? | 1 = No / No; 2 = On some occasions / En algunas ocasiones; 3 = Sometimes / A veces; 4 = Quite often / Muy a menudo; 777 = Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

Levels.2: On some occasions / En algunas ocasiones
Levels.777: Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

parental_monitor_q7_p.Description: Do you know how well your child achieves in different subjects in school? / ¿Sabe qué tan bien se desempeña su niño(a) en diferentes materias escolares? | 1 = Yes = completely / Sí = completamente; 2 = Yes = quite well / Sí = bastante bien; 3 = Yes = partly / Sí = en parte; 4 = No = very little / No = muy poco; 5 = No = nothing / No = nada; 777 = Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

Levels.777: Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

parental_monitor_q8_p.Description: Do you know which places your child visits when he/she is out with friends at night? / ¿Conoce cuales lugares visita su niño(a) cuando sale con sus amigos(as) en la noche? | 1 = We know all of them / Conocemos a todos; 2 = We know most of them / Conocemos a la mayoría; 3 = We know some of them / Conocemos a algunos; 4 = We know none of them / No conocemos a ningunos; 777 = Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

Levels.1: We know all of them / Conocemos a todos
Levels.2: We know most of them / Conocemos a la mayoría
Levels.3: We know some of them / Conocemos a algunos
Levels.4: We know none of them / No conocemos a ningunos
Levels.777: Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

parental_monitor_q9_p.Description: Has it happened in the last month that you have not had a clue where your child has been at night? / En el último mes, ¿ha sucedido que no tiene ninguna idea acerca de dónde ha estado su niño(a) en la noche? | 0 = No / No; 1 = Yes / Sí; 777 = Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

Levels.777: Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

parental_monitor_q10_p.Description: Do you usually know where your child is, and what he/she is doing in the afternoon right after school? / ¿Usualmente sabe dónde está su niño(a) y qué está haciendo en la tarde justo después de la escuela? | 1 = Yes = completely / Sí = completamente; 2 = Yes = quite well / Sí = bastante bien; 3 = Yes = partly / Sí = en parte; 4 = No = very little / No = muy poco; 5 = No = nothing / No = nada; 777 = Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

Levels.777: Decline to answer / Me niego a contestar

parental_monitor_ss_mean.Description: Parental Monitoring Summary Score: Mean of all items; Validation: minimum of 7 items answered
